==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|鬼|火}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=おにび|鬼|tr1=oni|t1=ghost, devil|火|tr2=hi|t2=fire}}. The ''hi'' changes to ''bi'' due to {{rendaku|おにび}}.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|おにび}}

# a [[will o' the wisp]]

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|狐火|きつねび}}
* {{ja-r|陰火|いんか}}
* {{ja-r|幽霊火|ゆうれいび}}
* {{ja-r|野火|やか}}
